account.title: Account Settings
account.account-id-hint: This is your unique account ID.
account.email-hint: You cannot change your email address.

location.title: Location Settings
location.location-hint: Your location determines what services we can offer to you.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.contact-information-hint: The information you provide here will be visible to all users.
profile.other-placeholder: Other information you may want your client's to know.
profile.other-hint: You can provide any additional information here.
profile.name: Your Name
profile.about-you-hint: Write to express your potential customers. Introduce yourself, list your achievements, or write about the services you provide.
profile.gender-hint: Some users may prefer to see your gender depending on the provided service. You are free to use your own words or to leave it empty.
